meanings.definition: Worthy of note or notice; remarkable.
meanings.sent1: The sunset was noteworthier than any other I had seen.
meanings.sent2: The new exhibit at the museum was noteworthier than the previous one.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to balance on the narrow ledge was noteworthier than its owner's.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness towards strangers made her noteworthier than any celebrity.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak, covered in snow, was noteworthier than any other in the range.

meanings.sent1: The rare flower in the garden was noteworthier than the rest.
meanings.sent2: The student's artwork was noteworthier than the others in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's acrobatic skills were noteworthier than its nut-gathering abilities.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft made him noteworthier than his peers.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were noteworthier than any modern building in the city.
